subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Zacha, the team’s first round pick, is working out in California to prepare for training camp next month and is expected to push for a spot on the Devils’ roster this year.
snippet: Zacha, the team’s first round pick, is working out in California to prepare for training camp next month and is expected to push for a spot on the Devils’ roster this year.
